glsa.title: libTIFF: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in libTIFF could lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The TIFF library contains encoding and decoding routines for the Tag Image File Format. It is called by numerous programs, including GNOME and KDE applications, to interpret TIFF images.
